title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 356.2 - Objective
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 356.2 - Objective

State Regulations

The objective of Probation Services for Article 3 Juvenile

Delinquency matters is to provide effective screening, assessment, case
planning, client engagement, and where appropriate, evidence-based services to
youth, for the non-judicial resolution of suitable complaints. The goal of
these services is to address the needs of youth, reduce unnecessary reliance on
detention and reduce future re-arrest/recidivism. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
356.2

Amended

New

York State Register March 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 13, eff. 3/27/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
